attributes.action: subsidise lpg for over 10 year old cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is the ecological benefit to scrapping cars over 10 years old and paying overseas companies to produce cars in their countries when the only people you hit are:
1/ drivers of 10 year old cars, who can not afford a new car OR
2/ Classic owners who will not give them away for 2k blood money..
Would it not be of benefit to assist these vehicles to become more economical through affordability? £2000 would equip one of these vehicles with an LPG system fitted in the UK AND uprated brakes MADE in the UK?  Making the vehicles of yesteryear more eco friendly than the best of the best of now!
